Sentencas: Enhancing fuel cell efficiency is crucial for promoting hydrogen adoption and reducing carbon emissions.
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) design affects power output and blower input, influencing current density and pressure drop.
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input

Sentencas: Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations were used to investigate these factors across various designs.
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input

Sentencas: A comparison of pin configurations, the co-flow arrangement (fuel and oxygen in the same direction) had the highest hydrogen consumption (68.98 %), surpassing cross-flow and counter-flow cases (62.86 % and 68.22 %), leading to superior cell performance.
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input

Sentencas: Adjusting square pin width enhanced under-rib convection, improving cell performance but increasing blower input.
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input

Sentencas: S3 model (0.5 mm width) showed the highest performance improvement ratio (eta = 1.1 %) from 0.25 mm width model (S1).
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input

Sentencas: Pin shape changes (square, diamond, triangle, circle) minimally affected performance, while staggered array design improved uniform flow and performance (eta = 1.2 %).
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input

Sentencas: Findings of this study can be helpful to optimize SOFC performance by considering cell density, blower consumption, and flow distribution.
Titulo: Investigation of cell performance in pin geometry of solid oxide fuel cell considering blower power input
